translations: [纺] 喷丝头；[昆] 吐丝器

sentences.sentence: Many tiny tubes connect each silk gland with a spinneret.
sentences.translation: 许多极细小的导管把每个造丝腺体与吐丝器相连。

sentences.sentence: “But if you look at a silkworm, it only has one kind of spinneret,” she added.
sentences.translation: “但桑蚕只有一种吐丝器，”她补充说。

sentences.sentence: Tight spinneret again after die heating oven reached technics temp. 3 hours .
sentences.translation: 箱体加热油炉油温达到工艺温度3小时之后，开始二次紧固喷丝板（热紧）。
